actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program to provide grants for the establishment of model Tuberculosis Prevention and Control Centers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Tuberculosis Prevention and Control Centers Act of 1992

summary.text: Tuberculosis Prevention and Control Centers Act of 1992 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants for the establishment of tuberculosis prevention and control centers to engage in certain activities, including: (1) screening, detection, and treatment; and (2) education and training for patients, providers, and the public. Requires the grant recipient to: (1) submit a local tuberculosis control plan; and (2) establish a local tuberculosis advisory committee. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Tuberculosis Prevention and Control Centers Act of 1992
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program to provide grants for the establishment of model Tuberculosis Prevention and Control Centers, and for other purposes.
